lead_paragraph: Fernando González defeated Ivan Ljubicic, 2-6, 6-3, 6-4, to reach the final of the China Open in Beijing. The second-seeded González will play third-seeded Tommy Robredo in today’s final. Robredo edged Nicolas Kiefer, 7-6 (5), 7-5.
snippet: Fernando González defeated Ivan Ljubicic, 2-6, 6-3, 6-4, to reach the final of the China Open in Beijing. The second-seeded González will play third-seeded Tommy Robredo in today’s final. Robredo edged Nicolas Kiefer, 7-6 (5), 7-5.
